name: demo-app
title: Demo App
description: App Framework Demo App - iOS and Android Apps with HTML & JavaScript - develop, build and deploy - free and open source!

scripts.dev: cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/create-icons &&  node scripts/dev-server
scripts.patch: npm version patch && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/create-icons && node scripts/build
scripts.minor: npm version minor && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/create-icons && node scripts/build
scripts.major: npm version major && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/create-icons && node scripts/build
scripts.database: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase-database && firebase login && firebase deploy --only database && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.storage: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase-storage && firebase login && firebase deploy --only storage && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.hosting: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase-deploy && firebase login && firebase deploy --only hosting && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.backup: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase-backup && firebase login && firebase database:get / >database-backup.json && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
